TopicTitle: Weka Lifeboat Spaceplane released - Kergin Galactic Spaceplane update soon!

Articles.Content:
Weka Lifeboat Spaceplane

Download Weka!

The Weka lifeboat spaceplane was intended as a cheap re-entry vessel for use in emergencies. Due to budget cuts and project cancellations, this manual flight only (no ASAS) budget spaceplane is now available for general use. Capslock mode is advised, as is short gentle stroking of the controls during landing. Suitable for land and water landings. Mun landings less so.

Kergin Galactic Spaceplane

Download v0.0!

This pack has everything entrepreneuring kerbals need to get their first paying customers suborbital. The current version is just cockpit, fuel tank and engine. Working wings coming very soon. Feathered reentry coming as soon as there\'s a more elegant solution than custom parachutes.
Thank You. I have been trying to find (or make) something like this.

Wow, this looks pretty great. Is it all one part?

EDIT: Nvm, just didn\'t read. ???

Oooh nice.

I don\'t know if you did already, but if you can make your fuselage match up with the 1m parts in C7 spaceplanes, that would be awesome. I do love mixing and matching.

And your cockpit would go swell with a lot of things!

They are 1m parts with 24 sided cylinders so should work in theory! Pretty new to modding though, so haven\'t quite figured out the nitty gritty of getting everything to mate smoothly and seamlessly. If you have any problems let me know.

Looking nice. I too am trying to figure out landing for planes (wheels or strong stuts is where i going so far). recommendations would be to slice the nose of and make that a sas module. I did this with the light on the top of my tardis.
Win!

Win!

Cannot be described better.

Cannot be described better.

Its a forum tradition that any addon pack that accurately depicts a real spacecraft be met with utter astonishment. Just carrying on the tradition

Nice model! I like the Virgin Galactic ideas so far. As to the feather entry, how about just a high altitude parachute? If you want it animated, make it the actual pivoting wings (make the 'cap' the fixed wing, and the 'canopy' the activated wing). You will still loose wings on landing though, so perhaps just make it an invisible parachute?

The plane uses normal landings once in the atmosphere, so you should not be able to land with a parachute/feather landing alone. Save some fuel for landing!

Hi, I\'ve been using your pack for a little bit testing it out. Seems balanced. Though is there any way you could make the fuel tank and the wings be two different objects instead of just one? Then the wings could actually generate lift instead of just sit there.

Just a suggestion, if you want to get the feathering effect on the wings, you could make them a separate part. There is a module called controlsrf. That has two parts. A base that doesn\'t move (used for attachment) and the control surface (part that moves). They generate lift like real wings, and the angle is controlled by the player. All you have to do is set the correct names of your models in whatever modelling software you\'re using for the animation to work. If you need any help with it, send me a message.

shiny

-Jeb is amused
I made a stock launcher. It flies like a wounded hippopotamus. Jeb cried for joy when he saw the blueprints.
shape is not quite right :/ but other wise it looks neat
I re-did the launcher, balancing the craft via sexy use of fuel lines, and ruining jeb\'s day.
will you be making the carrier plane as boosters?
It\'s somewhere on a long to-do list, though if someone steps in and does it first I won\'t be at all disappointed!
